mapper.sql: id, name, people, phone, yhzh, createId, createTime, isdeleted,house_number,address, adm_x,adm_y,admin_division_belong,contact_person_name,contact_person_phone,build_time, land_area,build_area,type,structure,product_content,site_picture,countryside_id
mapper.insert: insert into workshop_adm (name, people, phone, yhzh, createId, createTime, isdeleted, house_number,address,adm_x,adm_y,admin_division_belong,contact_person_name, contact_person_phone,build_time,land_area,build_area,type,structure, product_content,site_picture,countryside_id) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{people,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{houseNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{admX,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{admY,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{adminDivisionBelong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactPersonPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buildTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{landArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buildArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{structure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sitePicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{countrysideId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: update workshop_adm set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, people = #{people,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yhzh = #{yhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, house_number = #{houseNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adm_x = #{admX,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adm_y = #{admY,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_division_belong = #{adminDivisionBelong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_person_name = #{contactPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_person_phone = #{contactPersonPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, build_time = #{buildTime,jdbcType=DATE}, land_area = #{landArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, build_area = #{buildArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, structure = #{structure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_content = #{productContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, site_picture = #{sitePicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, countryside_id = #{countrysideId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update workshop_adm set isdeleted = '1' where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select cl.countryside_name as type,ifnull(b.count,0) as count from countrysideList cl left join(select countryside_id,count(id) as count from workshop_adm where isdeleted = '0' group by countryside_id) as b on b.countryside_id = cl.id
